entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Guelph
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 08:14 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -14.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Guelph Turfgrass Institute 09:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
Temperature: -14.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.7 kPa rising
Humidity: 77 %
Wind Chill: -25
Dewpoint: -17.3°C
Wind: SW 28 km/h gust 46 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Flurries. Blowing snow. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 29 this morning and minus 19 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 8.
entry.summary: Flurries with risk of snow squalls. Blowing snow. Local amount 5 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 7.
entry.summary: Flurries with risk of snow squalls. Local blowing snow in the morning. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
